summary: Philosophical conversations between a poet, politician, and scientist. No one is psychotic or out for revenge.
cast: Liv Ullmann|Sam Waterston|John Heard|Ione Skye|Emmanuel Montes|Jean Boursin|Gabrielle Danchick|Jeanne Van Phue|Penny White
keywords: reference to rene descartes|life cycle|outer space|cult favorite|organizing
director: Director: Bernt Amadeus Capra (as Bernt Capra)
title: Senderos de la mente
